35 //template<typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
36 template<class V, class E, class F, class H> //Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
37 class CDynamicMesh : public CBaseMesh<V,E,F,H>
38 {
39 public:
41  CDynamicMesh(){ m_vertex_id = 0; m_face_id = 0; };
43  ~CDynamicMesh();
44

49  V * splitFace( F * pFace );
53  V * splitEdge( E * pEdge );

59 protected:

82 //insert a vertex in the center of a face, split the face to 3 faces
83 
84 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
85 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
86 CVertex * CDynamicMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::splitFace( CFace * pFace )
87 {
88 
89  typedef CHalfEdge * tHalfEdge;
90 
91  CVertex * pV = CDynamicMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::createVertex( ++m_vertex_id );
92 
93  CVertex * v[3];
94  CHalfEdge * h[3];
95  CHalfEdge * hs[3];
96 
97  CEdge * eg[3];
98 
99  h[0] = faceHalfedge( pFace );
100  h[1] = faceNextCcwHalfEdge( h[0] );
101  h[2] = faceNextCcwHalfEdge( h[1] );
102 
103  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
104  {
105  v[i] = halfedgeTarget( h[i] );
106  eg[i] = halfedgeEdge( h[i] );
107  hs[i] = halfedgeSym( h[i] );
108  }
109 
110 
111  CFace * f = new CFace();
112  assert( f != NULL );
113  f->id() = ++m_face_id;
114  this->m_faces.push_back( f );
115 
116  //create halfedges
117  tHalfEdge hes[3];
118  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
119  {
120  hes[i] = new CHalfEdge;
121  assert( hes[i] );
122  }
123 
124  //linking to each other
125  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
126  {
127  hes[i]->he_next() = hes[(i+1)%3];
128  hes[i]->he_prev() = hes[(i+2)%3];
129  }
130 
131  //linking to face
132  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
133  {
134  hes[i]->face() = f;
135  f->halfedge() = hes[i];
136  }
137 
138 
139  f = new CFace();
140  assert( f != NULL );
141  f->id() = ++m_face_id;
142  this->m_faces.push_back( f );
143 
144  //create halfedges
145  tHalfEdge hes2[3];
146 
147  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
148  {
149  hes2[i] = new CHalfEdge;
150  assert( hes2[i] );
151  }
152 
153  //linking to each other
154  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
155  {
156  hes2[i]->he_next() = hes2[(i+1)%3];
157  hes2[i]->he_prev() = hes2[(i+2)%3];
158  }
159 
160  //linking to face
161  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
162  {
163  hes2[i]->face() = f;
164  f->halfedge() = hes2[i];
165  }
166 
167  CEdge * e[3];
168  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
169  {
170  e[i] = new CEdge();
171  assert( e[i] );
172  this->m_edges.push_back( e[i] );
173  }
174 
175  __attach_halfedge_to_edge( h[1], hes[0], e[0] );
176  __attach_halfedge_to_edge( hes[2], hes2[1], e[1] );
177  __attach_halfedge_to_edge( h[2], hes2[0], e[2] );
178  __attach_halfedge_to_edge( h[0], hs[0], eg[0] );
179  __attach_halfedge_to_edge( hes[1], hs[1], eg[1] );
180  __attach_halfedge_to_edge( hes2[2], hs[2], eg[2] );
181 
182 
183 
184  pV->halfedge() = h[1];
185 
186 
187  h[1]->vertex() = pV;
188  h[2]->vertex() = v[2];
189 
190  hes[0]->vertex() = v[0];
191  hes[1]->vertex() = v[1];
192  hes[2]->vertex() = pV;
193 
194  hes2[0]->vertex() = pV;
195  hes2[1]->vertex() = v[1];
196  hes2[2]->vertex() = v[2];
197 
198  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
199  {
200  v[i]->halfedge() = hs[i]->he_sym();
201  }
202  return pV;
203 
204 };
205 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
206 
207 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
208 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
209 void CDynamicMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::swapEdge( CEdge * edge )
210 {
211 
212  CHalfEdge * he_left = edgeHalfedge( edge, 0 );
213  CHalfEdge * he_right = edgeHalfedge( edge, 1 );
214 
215  if( he_right == NULL ) return;
216 
217  CHalfEdge * ph[6];
218 
219  ph[0] = he_left;
220  ph[1] = faceNextCcwHalfEdge( ph[0] );
221  ph[2] = faceNextCcwHalfEdge( ph[1] );
222 
223 
224  ph[3] = he_right;
225  ph[4] = faceNextCcwHalfEdge( ph[3] );
226  ph[5] = faceNextCcwHalfEdge( ph[4] );
227 
228  CVertex * pv[4];
229 
230  pv[0] = halfedgeTarget( ph[0]);
231  pv[1] = halfedgeTarget( ph[1]);
232  pv[2] = halfedgeTarget( ph[2]);
233  pv[3] = halfedgeTarget( ph[4]);
234 
235  bool boundary[4];
236 
237  for( int i = 0; i < 4; i ++ )
238  {
239  boundary[i] = pv[0]->boundary();
240  }
241 
242  int pi[6];
243  CEdge * pe[6];
244  for( int i = 0; i < 6; i ++ )
245  {
246  CHalfEdge * he = ph[i];
247  CEdge * e= halfedgeEdge( he );
248  pe[i] = e;
249 
250  if( e->halfedge(0) == he )
251  {
252  pi[i] = 0;
253  }
254  else
255  {
256  assert( e->halfedge(1) == he );
257  pi[i] = 1;
258  }
259  }
260 
261  //relink the vertices
262 
263  ph[0]->target() = pv[1];
264  if( !boundary[1] )
265  {
266  pv[1]->halfedge() = ph[0];
267  }
268  ph[1]->target() = pv[2];
269  if( !boundary[2] )
270  {
271  pv[2]->halfedge() = ph[1];
272  }
273 
274  ph[2]->target() = pv[3];
275  if( !boundary[3] )
276  {
277  pv[3]->halfedge() = ph[2];
278  }
279 
280  ph[3]->target() = pv[3];
281  if( !boundary[3] )
282  {
283  pv[3]->halfedge() = ph[3];
284  }
285 
286  ph[4]->target() = pv[0];
287  if( !boundary[0] )
288  {
289  pv[0]->halfedge() = ph[4];
290  }
291 
292  ph[5]->target() = pv[1];
293  if( !boundary[1] )
294  {
295  pv[1]->halfedge() = ph[5];
296  }
297 
298  //relink the edge-halfedge pointers
299 
300  ph[1]->edge() = pe[2];
301  pe[2]->halfedge( pi[2] ) = ph[1];
302 
303  ph[2]->edge() = pe[4];
304  pe[4]->halfedge( pi[4] ) = ph[2];
305 
306  ph[4]->edge() = pe[5];
307  pe[5]->halfedge( pi[5] ) = ph[4];
308 
309  ph[5]->edge() = pe[1];
310  pe[1]->halfedge( pi[1] ) = ph[5];
311 
312 
313  for(int i = 0; i < 6; i ++ )
314  {
315  CHalfEdge * he = ph[i];
316  CHalfEdge * sh = halfedgeSym( he );
317  assert( he->target() == sh->he_prev()->target() );
318  assert( he->he_prev()->target() == sh->target() );
319  }
320 
321 };
322 
323 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

326 //insert a vertex in the center of an edge, split each neighboring face into 2 faces
327 
328 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
329 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
330 CVertex * CDynamicMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::splitEdge( CEdge * pEdge )
331 {
332 
333  CVertex * pV = CDynamicMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::createVertex( ++ m_vertex_id );
334 
335 
336  CHalfEdge * h[12];
337  CHalfEdge * s[6];
338  CVertex * v[6];
339  CEdge * eg[6];
340 
341  h[0] = edgeHalfedge( pEdge, 0 );
342  h[1] = faceNextCcwHalfEdge( h[0] );
343  h[2] = faceNextCcwHalfEdge( h[1] );
344 
345  h[3] = edgeHalfedge( pEdge, 1 );
346  h[4] = faceNextCcwHalfEdge( h[3] );
347  h[5] = faceNextCcwHalfEdge( h[4] );
348 
349 
350  CFace * f[4];
351  f[0] = halfedgeFace( h[0] );
352  f[1] = halfedgeFace( h[3] );
353 
354  for( int i = 0; i < 6; i ++ )
355  {
356  eg[i] = halfedgeEdge( h[i] );
357  v[i] = halfedgeVertex(h[i]);
358  s[i] = halfedgeSym( h[i] );
359  }
360 
361  f[2] = new CFace();
362  assert( f[2] != NULL );
363  f[2]->id() = ++ m_face_id;
364  this->m_faces.push_back( f[2] );
365 
366  //create halfedges
367  for(int i = 6; i < 9; i ++ )
368  {
369  h[i] = new CHalfEdge;
370  assert( h[i] );
371  }
372 
373  //linking to each other
374  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
375  {
376  h[i+6]->he_next() = h[6+(i+1)%3];
377  h[i+6]->he_prev() = h[6+(i+2)%3];
378  }
379 
380  //linking to face
381  for(int i = 6; i < 9; i ++ )
382  {
383  h[i]->face() = f[2];
384  f[2]->halfedge()= h[i];
385  }
386 
387 
388  f[3] = new CFace();
389  assert( f[3] != NULL );
390  f[3]->id() = ++m_face_id;
391  this->m_faces.push_back( f[3] );
392 
393  //create halfedges
394  for(int i = 9; i < 12; i ++ )
395  {
396  h[i] = new CHalfEdge;
397  assert( h[i] );
398  }
399 
400  //linking to each other
401  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
402  {
403  h[i+9]->he_next() = h[9+(i+1)%3];
404  h[i+9]->he_prev() = h[9+(i+2)%3];
405  }
406 
407  //linking to face
408  for(int i = 9; i < 12; i ++ )
409  {
410  h[i]->face() = f[3];
411  f[3]->halfedge() = h[i];
412  }
413 
414  CEdge * e[3];
415 
416  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
417  {
418  e[i] = new CEdge();
419  this->m_edges.push_back( e[i] );
420  assert( e[i] );
421  }
422 
423  __attach_halfedge_to_edge(h[2], h[6] , e[0]);
424  __attach_halfedge_to_edge(h[8], h[9] , e[1]);
425  __attach_halfedge_to_edge(h[4], h[11], e[2]);
426 
427  __attach_halfedge_to_edge(h[0], h[3], eg[0]);
428  __attach_halfedge_to_edge(h[1], s[1], eg[1]);
429  __attach_halfedge_to_edge(h[5], s[5], eg[5]);
430 
431  __attach_halfedge_to_edge(h[7], s[2], eg[2]);
432  __attach_halfedge_to_edge(h[10], s[4], eg[4]);
433 
434 
435  h[0]->vertex() = v[0];
436  h[1]->vertex() = v[1];
437  h[2]->vertex() = pV;
438  h[3]->vertex() = pV;
439  h[4]->vertex() = v[4];
440  h[5]->vertex() = v[5];
441  h[6]->vertex() = v[1];
442  h[7]->vertex() = v[2];
443  h[8]->vertex() = pV;
444  h[9]->vertex() = v[2];
445  h[10]->vertex()= v[4];
446  h[11]->vertex()= pV;
447 
448 
449 
450  v[0]->halfedge() = h[0];
451  v[1]->halfedge() = h[1];
452  v[2]->halfedge() = h[7];
453  v[4]->halfedge() = h[4];
454  pV->halfedge() = h[3];
455 
456  for( int k = 0; k < 4; k ++ )
457  {
458  CHalfEdge * pH = faceHalfedge( f[k] );
459  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
460  {
461  assert( pH->vertex() == pH->he_sym()->he_prev()->vertex() );
462  pH = faceNextCcwHalfEdge( pH );
463  }
464  }
465  return pV;
466 
467 };
468

471 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
472 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
473 void CDynamicMesh<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge>::__attach_halfedge_to_edge( CHalfEdge * he0, CHalfEdge * he1, CEdge * e )
474 {
475  e->halfedge(0 ) = he0;
476  e->halfedge(1 ) = he1;
477 
478  he0->edge() = e;
479  he1->edge() = e;
480 
481 };
